languages.text: "На то была воля Неумирающего. Но прежде — воля твоя, Домин'{name}. Ты благословил{mf||а} меня на охоту, чтобы я привела тебя к Немезиту. Я сделала то, что должен был сделать твой клинок. И охота увенчалась успехом".

traits.locale_text: "На то была воля Неумирающего. Но прежде — воля твоя, Эним'{name}. Разве не благословил{mf||а} ты меня на охоту, дабы настигли мои клинки врагов твоих? Дабы я привела тебя к Немезиту? Я сделала то, что должен был сделать твой клинок. И охота увенчалась успехом".

languages.text: "Such was the Undying One's will. And yours before that, Domin'{name}. You blessed my hunt so that I might lead you to Nemesite. Your blade performed its service, and the hunt was fruitful."
languages.original_text: "На то была воля Неумирающего. Но прежде — воля твоя, Домин'{name}. Ты благословил{mf||а} меня на охоту, чтобы я привела тебя к Немезиту. Я сделала то, что должен был сделать твой клинок. И охота увенчалась успехом".

traits.locale_text: "Such was the Undying One's will. And yours before that, Enim'{name}. You blessed my hunt so that I would lead you to Nemesite. Your blade performed its service, and the hunt delivered the results."
"Such was the Undying One's will. And yours before that, Enim'{name}. You blessed my hunt so that I would lead you to Nemesite. Your blade performed its service, and the hunt delivered the results."
"Such was the Undying One's will. And yours before that, Enim'{name}. You blessed my hunt so that I might lead you to Nemesite. Your blade performed its service, and the hunt was fruitful."
"Such was the Undying One's will. And yours before that, Enim'{name}. You blessed my hunt so that I might lead you to Nemesite. Your blade performed its service, and the hunt was fruitful."
"Such was the Undying One's will. And yours before that, Domin'{name}. You blessed my hunt so that I might lead you to Nemesite. Your blade performed its service, and the hunt was fruitful."
"Such was the Undying One's will. And yours before that, Domin'{name}. You blessed my hunt so that I might lead you to Nemesite. Your blade performed its service, and the hunt was fruitful."

languages.text: «Así lo dispuso el Inmortal. Y usted antes que Él, Domin'{name}. Usted bendijo mi cacería para que le llevase hasta Nemesitio. Su hoja ha cumplido con su cometido; la caza ha sido fructífera».
languages.original_text: "Such was the Undying One's will. And yours before that, Domin'{name}. You blessed my hunt so that I might lead you to Nemesite. Your blade performed its service, and the hunt was fruitful."

traits.locale_text: «Así lo dispuso el Inmortal. Y usted antes que Él, Domin'{name}. Usted bendijo mi cacería para que le llevase hasta Nemesitio. Su hoja ha cumplido con su cometido; la caza ha sido fructífera».

languages.text: 「それが不死の者の意思だった。そして、それ以前にあなたのね、ドミン・{name}。私があなたをネメサイトの元へと導けるよう、狩りを祝福してくれた。あなたの刃が役目を果たしたおかげで、狩りは実り多きものだった」
languages.original_text: "Such was the Undying One's will. And yours before that, Domin'{name}. You blessed my hunt so that I might lead you to Nemesite. Your blade performed its service, and the hunt was fruitful."

traits.locale_text: 「それが不死の者の意思だった。そして、それ以前にあなたのね、ドミン・{name}。私があなたをネメサイトの元へと導けるよう、狩りを祝福してくれた。あなたの刃が役目を果たしたおかげで、狩りは実り多きものだった」

languages.text: “这是不死之神的旨意，也同样是你的旨意，秘者{name}。你赐予了我祝福，让我带着你找到涅墨斯特。你的利刃完成了它的任务，狩猎非常顺利。”
languages.original_text: "Such was the Undying One's will. And yours before that, Domin'{name}. You blessed my hunt so that I might lead you to Nemesite. Your blade performed its service, and the hunt was fruitful."

traits.locale_text: “这是不死之神的旨意，也同样是你的旨意，秘者{name}。你赐予了我祝福，让我带着你找到涅墨斯特。你的利刃完成了它的任务，狩猎非常顺利。”

languages.text: "So lautete der Wille des Todlosen. Und Eurer davor, Domin'{name}. Ihr habt meine Jagd gesegnet, auf dass ich Euch zu Nemesit führe. Eure Klinge hat ihren Dienst erfüllt, und die Jagd war fruchtbar."
languages.original_text: "Such was the Undying One's will. And yours before that, Domin'{name}. You blessed my hunt so that I might lead you to Nemesite. Your blade performed its service, and the hunt was fruitful."

traits.locale_text: "So lautete der Wille des Todlosen. Und Eurer davor, Domin'{name}. Ihr habt meine Jagd gesegnet, auf dass ich Euch zu Nemesit führe. Eure Klinge hat ihren Dienst erfüllt, und die Jagd war fruchtbar."

languages.text: « Telle était la volonté de l'Immortel. Et la vôtre avant cela, Domin'{name}. Vous m'avez donné votre bénédiction pour que je vous conduise jusqu'à Némésite. Votre lame a accompli sa mission, et la chasse a porté ses fruits. »
languages.original_text: "Such was the Undying One's will. And yours before that, Domin'{name}. You blessed my hunt so that I might lead you to Nemesite. Your blade performed its service, and the hunt was fruitful."

traits.locale_text: « Telle était la volonté de l'Immortel. Et la vôtre avant cela, Domin'{name}. Vous m'avez donné votre bénédiction pour que je vous conduise jusqu'à Némésite. Votre lame a accompli sa mission, et la chasse a porté ses fruits. »

languages.original_text: "Such was the Undying One's will. And yours before that, Domin'. You blessed my hunt so that I might lead you to Nemesite. Your blade performed its service, and the hunt was fruitful."

languages.text: "Ölmeyen'in arzusu bu yöndeydi. Ayrıca seninki de öyle Domin'{name}. Nemezit'e giden yolu göstermem için ava çıkmama müsaade etmiştin. Kılıcın, hizmetini yerine getirdi. Av başarılı oldu."
languages.original_text: "Such was the Undying One's will. And yours before that, Domin'{name}. You blessed my hunt so that I might lead you to Nemesite. Your blade performed its service, and the hunt was fruitful."
